text: Bernhard Theodore Mittemeyer (born October 30, 1930) is an American urologist and retired lieutenant general in the U.S. Army. He served as the 35th Surgeon General of the United States Army from 1981 to 1985. He has served as the chief of urological surgery at Texas Tech University Health Sciences Center. He was born in Paramaribo, Suriname. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:American generals Category:American physicians
title: Bernhard T. Mittemeyer
